name: MoPub-Chartboost-Adapters
summary: Chartboost Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Banner, Interstitial, Rewarded Video.

To download and integrate the Chartboost SDK, please check this tutorial: https://answers.chartboost.com/en-us/child_article/ios 


For inquiries and support, please reach out to https://answers.chartboost.com/en-us/zingtree.
